name: .ITS File Extension
summary: Learn about .ITS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An ITS file is a sample used by Impulse Tracker, an audio-tracking program. It contains a PCM sample of a sound effect, voice, etc., in the Impulse Tracker Sample (ITS) format. ITS files also store sample metadata, such as the sample name and format version in which it is saved.

content: Impulse Tracker is a free music tracker created by Jeffrey Lim and released in 1995. The music sequencing program allows you to create music from samples and instruments organized into tracks and modified by notes and effects. In addition, you can share and load ITS samples in Impulse Tracker to add them to your composition (saved in the .IT file).

instructions: You can open an ITS file with Impulse Tracker (Windows), but the software is not actively developed and may not run on your operating system version. CocoModX (macOS) can also open ITI files but is discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
